page.title: 08ROBINSON'S MAMMOTH ONIONS
page.content: {FORTON FAMILY DAY cont We have our tea at about 18.30pm. After tea we watch TV till bed at around 20.00 _ 20.30. {Robinsons garden nurseries { }Robinsons nurseries are famous for their mammoth onions and leeks. The nurseries were formed in 1860 and cover 22 acres. Their main plants are giant onions leeks and celery and unusual varieties of tomatoes and herbs Robinson grew an onion that got in the Guinness Book of Records. It weighed 30 pounds. An average mammoth onion weighs 5 pounds and has a 22 inch circumference.
